attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the ease of misunderstanding up to and including fraud on e-petitions. To take no action on any petition apart from this one, unless a wholly reliable agent takes a statistically accurate audit.  The audit to show sufficient probability that the e-mail addresses, names and physical addresses exist and those named made the entry themselves and have a clear understanding of the issue.

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
